alert.note: Alert for Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino County Mountains; San Diego County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued July 25 at 12:44PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...A portion of Southern California including the following areas: Riverside County Mountains, San Bernardino County Mountains and San Diego County Mountains. * WHEN...Until 7 PM PDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Very slow-moving thunderstorms are beginning to develop over mountainous terrain, and may move over burn scars where it takes substantially less rainfall to cause flash flooding. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino County Mountains; San Diego County Mountains
